name: Mage Rage (afells, StudioKaizer)
description:
This is Mage Rage a multiplayer twin-stick deathmatch!

Defeat your fellow mages by shooting them with your wand!

Use your barrier to negate damage (just be mindful of the cooldown)

The last wizard standing wins!

The Controls:

Movement: W, A, S, D

Fire Magical Beam: Left click Mouse

Cast Magic barrier: Right click Mouse
